items.title: How do I make sure my son-in-law doesn’t get his hands on my daughter’s inheritance?
items.description: “So far, my daughter and her husband have a solid marriage.”

items.title: 401(k) millionaires became rarer in the first quarter — but it’s not all bad news
items.description: Stock-market weakness in the first quarter of 2025 knocked some retirement investors out of the millionaires club, but it didn’t stop workers from sav...

items.title: ‘He failed in his fiduciary duty’: My brother liquidated our mother’s 401(k) for her nursing home. He claimed the rest.
items.description: “My brother, the executor of her will, coerced her during her illness to give him power of attorney.”

items.title: You want income in retirement, but soaring bond yields can be risky. What should you do?
items.description: The bond seesaw may be extra bumpy right now, but it’s not time to get off the ride.

items.title: Circle’s $1.1 billion IPO shows Wall Street is taking stablecoin seriously
items.description: Circle Internet is betting on wider use of its USDC digital currency, which is redeemable one-for-one with the U.S. dollar.
